title: Sample Variant
description: Schema for variant info for sample

GQ.title: Genotype Quality
GQ.description: phred-scaled quality score that the genotype is accurate [min(99,PL(max)-PL(second))]

PL.title: Genotype Likelihoods (0/0,0/1,1/1)
PL.description: Phred-scaled likelihoods for genotype (Ref/Ref, Ref/Alt, Alt/Alt)

QUAL.title: Variant Quality
QUAL.description: phred-scaled quality score for the assertion made in ALT (multi-sample)

file.title: File
file.description: String Accession of the vcf file used in digestion

novoPP.title: novoCaller PP
novoPP.description: Posterior probability of de novo mutation

samplegeno_ac.title: Sample Genotype (Alt Allele Count Per Gene)
samplegeno_ac.schema_title: Sample Genotype (Alt Allele Count Per Gene)

samplegeno_role.title: Familial Relation
samplegeno_role.description: Relationship of the person who submitted this sample relative to the proband

samplegeno_sex.title: Sex
samplegeno_sex.description: Sex of the donor of this sample ID

gene_notes.title: Gene Notes
gene_notes.description: Notes related to the relevant Gene

variant_notes.title: Variant Notes
variant_notes.description: Notes related to the relevant Variant

interpretation.title: Clinical Interpretation
interpretation.description: Clinical Interpretation Note connected to this item

discovery_interpretation.title: Discovery Interpretation
discovery_interpretation.description: Gene/Variant Discovery interpretation note connected to this item

associated_genelists.title: Gene List
associated_genelists.description: Groups of genes that are relevant for a disease or condition

inheritance_modes.title: Inheritance Modes
rescue_terms: Low relevance, homozygous in a parent
Low relevance, present in both parent(s)
Low relevance, missing call(s) in family
